name: Phil's School: The Dream
description:
Can you survive the nine minutes of chaos?

ENTER to use flashlight, Q, W, E, A, S, D to move, mouse to look around. Press \ to quit the level. You goal is to survive 'them' until it is safe again.

All graphics by me, music by me, sound effects by me and some from FNaF. This is the 3rd game in Phil's School series, inspired off of FNaF.
